official-title.#text:
To provide monetary awards to any individual who provides information pertaining to the electronic
			 communications sent by Lois Lerner during her employment at the Internal
			 Revenue Service, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Identify and Recover Sent E-Mails Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

that an individual or group of individuals has

shall pay a cash award of $1,000,000 to such

that an individual or group of individuals
			 has provided pertinent information sufficient for prosecution of the
			 individuals involved in illegal activities (if any) with respect to the
			 destruction of the electronic communications sent by Lois Lerner during
			 her employment with the

shall pay a cash award of $500,000 to any such individual or
			 group of individuals.

text.#text: Upon receipt of certification from the

quote.#text: Department of the Treasury—Internal Revenue Service—Taxpayer Services
